verses.verse: <S%H7971>Send<s%> you the <S%H3733>lamb<s%> to the <S%H4910>ruler<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H5554>Sela<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> to the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

For it shall be, that, as a <S%H5074>wandering<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> <S%H7971>cast<s%> out of the <S%H7064>nest,<s%> so the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be at the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon.<s%>

<S%H935>Take<s%> <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H6415>judgment;<s%> <S%H7896>make<s%> your <S%H6738>shadow<s%> as the <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H6672>noonday;<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> the <S%H5080>outcasts;<s%> <S%H1540>denude<s%> not him that <S%H5074>wanders.<s%>

Let my <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> with you, <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> be you a <S%H5643>covert<s%> to them from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H7703>spoiler:<s%> for the <S%H4160>extortionist<s%> is at an <S%H657>end,<s%> the <S%H7701>spoiler<s%> <S%H3615>ceases,<s%> the <S%H7429>oppressors<s%> are <S%H8552>consumed<s%> out of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And in <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall the <S%H3678>throne<s%> be <S%H3559>established:<s%> and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on it in <S%H571>truth<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H8199>judging,<s%> and <S%H1875>seeking<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H4106>hastening<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>

We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> he is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1341>proud:<s%> even of his <S%H1346>haughtiness,<s%> and his <S%H1347>pride,<s%> and his <S%H5678>wrath:<s%> but his <S%H907>lies<s%> shall not be <S%H3651>so.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> shall <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3213>howl<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one shall <S%H3213>howl:<s%> for the <S%H808>foundations<s%> of <S%H7025>Kirhareseth<s%> shall you <S%H1897>mourn;<s%> <S%H389>surely<s%> they are <S%H5218>stricken.<s%>

For the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> <S%H535>languish,<s%> and the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah:<s%> the <S%H1167>lords<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> have <S%H1986>broken<s%> down the <S%H8291>principal<s%> <S%H8291>plants<s%> thereof, they are <S%H5060>come<s%> even to <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> they <S%H8582>wandered<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> her <S%H7976>branches<s%> are <S%H5203>stretched<s%> out, they are <S%H5674>gone<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will <S%H1058>mourn<s%> with the <S%H1065>weeping<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah:<s%> I will <S%H7301>water<s%> you with my <S%H1832>tears,<s%> O <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh:<s%> for the <S%H1959>shouting<s%> for your <S%H7019>summer<s%> fruits and for your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen.<s%>

And <S%H8057>gladness<s%> is <S%H622>taken<s%> away, and <S%H1524>joy<s%> out of the <S%H3759>plentiful<s%> field; and in the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7442>singing,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there be <S%H7321>shouting:<s%> the <S%H1869>treaders<s%> shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> out <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H3342>presses;<s%> I have made their vintage <S%H1959>shouting<s%> to <S%H7673>cease.<s%>
<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H4578>bowels<s%> shall <S%H1993>sound<s%> like an <S%H3658>harp<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and my <S%H7130>inward<s%> parts for <S%H7025>Kirharesh.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> it is <S%H7200>seen<s%> that <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H3811>weary<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H1116>high<s%> place, that he shall <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to <S%H6419>pray;<s%> but he shall not <S%H3201>prevail.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> since that <S%H227>time.<s%>

But <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> as the <S%H8141>years<s%> of an <S%H7916>hireling,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be <S%H7034>contemned,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude;<s%> and the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> shall be <S%H4213>very<s%> <S%H4213>small<s%> and <S%H3808>feeble.<s%> <S%H3524><s%>
